name: Ball Knight
description:
You are Ball Knight! You are imprisoned in the Mad Wizard's Dungeon. You need to use your special skill to escape - become a ball that can bounce on walls. Crush enemies, collect balls, upgrade your skills and free Ball Knight!

This is a short (subjective) arcade game. Took way too long to make XD

All Music in-game by:

Matthew Huffaker

www.teknoaxe.com

www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe

Controls:
When the timer is counting down, mash the spacebar as fast as possible. Use Spacebar or Left Mouse to bounce.

Tip:
Time your bounces right after you hit the wall. Helps maximize your boost! Upgrade the balls received as early as possible.
